ethanol and deionized water for several times. The final product was subjected to oven drying at 60 o C for 12 h. The crystallographic phase of the as-developed samples was acquired by a X-ray diffractometer equipped with a UV cut-off filter to simulate visible light ( 400 nm). The computations were performed using Cambridge Sequential Total Energy Package (CASTEP) code on the basis of density functional theory (DFT) within the ultrasoft pseudopotential approach. BWO-NS resulted in the bandgap narrowing, which could be attributed to the well-known mystical effects of ion exchange for reconstruction of energy bands. 48,49Indisputably, this revolution will contribute positively to the utilization of solar energy and reducibility of the photocatalyst, which will be corroborated by the photocatalytic CO 2 reduction experiments. Please find the category of Light_source and Lamp from the provided context which describe an solar chemical experiment.
The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.
